overview: Jane and Tom decide to pack the kids off and book a romantic weekend away. When their car unexpectedly breaks down late at night they find themselves knocking on a stranger's door only to be presented with an invitation to a swingers party. Thrown in at the deep end Jane and Tom now have to navigate their way through uncharted waters. Will they take the plunge?
tagline: A Couple Journey Into The World Of Swinging
title: The Invitation
